alchemical.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
alchemical.jpg.description: A woman with metallic skin and an intense look.
alchemical.jpg.title: Silken Blade of the Heavens, Moonsilver Alchemical

valkyria-calling.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
valkyria-calling.jpg.description: A haunted, silvery field with a gleaming path drawing you forward. In the background a woman casting a spell by standing stones.
valkyria-calling.jpg.title: Valkyia Calling

android.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
android.jpg.description: A metallic woman in jeans and bra, looking up to the side.
android.jpg.title: Sensual Android

portrait-gold-stone.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
portrait-gold-stone.jpg.description: A woman in a pale gold robe is standing in a cave filled with black and gold stones.
portrait-gold-stone.jpg.title: The Mystic

bast.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
bast.jpg.description: A photo of a woman combined with that of a cat.
bast.jpg.title: Bast, Goddess of Cats

mairead-selkie.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
mairead-selkie.jpg.description: A dark image of a woman in water, with barely her eyes above the surface.
mairead-selkie.jpg.title: Mairead, a selkie

collage.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
collage.jpg.description: Digital collage of flowers and a woman, with the colours of the non-binary flag dominating it.
collage.jpg.title: Non-binary pride pop-art

speed-weasel.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
speed-weasel.jpg.description: A triptych of a desert landscape at twilight, with the right-most panel having a stretching woman moving fast enough to leave a trail of after-images.
speed-weasel.jpg.title: Speed Weasel—Sharp and fast

beata-beatris.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
beata-beatris.jpg.description: The ghost Beatris and her haunted doll Beata. St Dymphna.
beata-beatris.jpg.title: Beata, Doll, and Beatris, Ghost

breaking-out.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
breaking-out.jpg.description: A woman preparing to step out of her framed photograph as she sees a glowing red butterfly flit past.
breaking-out.jpg.title: Breaking Out

bride-of-the-ocean.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
bride-of-the-ocean.jpg.description: A woman facing the veiled sun, with the skirt of her voluminous gown the ocean itself.
bride-of-the-ocean.jpg.title: Bride of the Ocean

bridge.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
bridge.jpg.description: While at first glance this looks like only a bridge over a stream, in the distance is a figure with antlers.
bridge.jpg.title: The Bridge

cherry-blossom-in-bloom.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
cherry-blossom-in-bloom.jpg.description: A collage of a woman against a wall, with parts of her form replaced with cherry blossoms.
cherry-blossom-in-bloom.jpg.title: Cherry Blossoms in Bloom

cinderella.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
cinderella.jpg.description: A sepia-toned photograph of a fairy sitting on a mushroom, longingly looking towards a house across the lake.
cinderella.jpg.title: Cinderella, a Fairy's tale

cosmic-woman.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
cosmic-woman.jpg.description: A portrait of a smiling woman with the galaxy behind her, and the starry impression of her amongst the stars.
cosmic-woman.jpg.title: Cosmic Woman

crackd-from-side-to-side.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
crackd-from-side-to-side.jpg.description: Pop-art in pinks and teal, with a piece of glass held in front of the subject's face showing realism.
crackd-from-side-to-side.jpg.title: Crack'd from side to side

dancing-through-hell.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
dancing-through-hell.jpg.description: A woman is seen belly dancing through a portal of red and gold leaves.
dancing-through-hell.jpg.title: Dancing through Hell

daniel.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
daniel.jpg.description: A man walking down a set of stairs with purpose, with the doll Beata hiding in the shadows. St Dymphna.
daniel.jpg.title: Daniel Nowak, Carpenter

descending-angel.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
descending-angel.jpg.description: A raging storm as a beautiful woman, with wing-like ribbons around her, appears among stone ruins.
descending-angel.jpg.title: Descending Angel

double-exposure.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
double-exposure.jpg.description: Toned in blue, this shows an ocean wave superimposed onto a woman looking back.
double-exposure.jpg.title: The Goddess Ran in the ocean

erik.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
erik.jpg.description: Toned in browns with a hint of flame and smoke, this shows a man in front of a brick room, glancing at something. St Dymphna.
erik.jpg.title: Erik Johansson, Ghost

fairies-in-forest.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
fairies-in-forest.jpg.description: A sunlit tree with two fairies in it. One is sitting on a mushroom in thought, the other standing and looking at the first.
fairies-in-forest.jpg.title: Fairies in Forest

fairy-on-branch.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
fairy-on-branch.jpg.description: A fairy in a beautiful gown is sitting on a branch, looking back at the bird she shares a seat with.
fairy-on-branch.jpg.title: Fairy on branch

flamingo.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
flamingo.jpg.description: Sometimes you're just too faboulus for your surroundings. A desaturated polaroid image is the background, with two flamingos rising out of it in a highly saturated look.
flamingo.jpg.title: Flamingos in love

forest-ghost.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
forest-ghost.jpg.description: A forest toned in red to purple, with a white-clad woman in the background running ... probably away from the ghost in the foreground.
forest-ghost.jpg.title: Into the Weald of Iron and Fangs

golden-mona-lisa.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
golden-mona-lisa.jpg.description: A vintage, worn frame surrounds a woman with a intense look. Her power is accentuated by the golden sheen of her skin.
golden-mona-lisa.jpg.title: Golden Mona Lisa

hannes.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
hannes.jpg.description: A portrait against a worn wall, of a man with broad shoulders and a muscular look. St Dymphna.
hannes.jpg.title: Hannes Olsson, Handyman

inez.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
inez.jpg.description: Another portrait against a worn wall. This is of a Black woman with a braided crown of bleached hair and highlights of red. St Dymphna.
inez.jpg.title: Inez Falk, Teamleader

into-the-mist.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
into-the-mist.jpg.description: A teen girl glancing back at the viewer as she chooses the path least travelled.
into-the-mist.jpg.title: Into the mist

islay.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
islay.jpg.description: A portrait of a black-haired woman looking back, againt a blue background.
islay.jpg.title: Ran/Islay, Portrait edition

leaf-dancer.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
leaf-dancer.jpg.description: A fairy dancing on a leaf in the rain. As she's enjoying her dance, the leaf is floating in a stream.
leaf-dancer.jpg.title: Fairy dancing on a leaf

magic.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
magic.jpg.description: Experiment with ribbons of light creating a magical feeling under the full moon as a woman in black kneels in a ring of fire.
magic.jpg.title: Magic Moor

mirror-mirror.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
mirror-mirror.jpg.description: A woman in a wedding dress holds up a mirror, but in the reflection we see someone else. Something wicked.
mirror-mirror.jpg.title: Mirror, mirror

mist-fairies.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
mist-fairies.jpg.description: Some fairies from Swedish myths were thought to be the swirling mist in the early morning.
mist-fairies.jpg.title: Fairies dancing in the morning mist

negative-butterfly.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
negative-butterfly.jpg.description: A vintage photo of a butterfly on a flower, except the butterfly is only suggested by negative space in the shape of its wings.
negative-butterfly.jpg.title: Negative Butterfly

nils-holgersson.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
nils-holgersson.jpg.description: From a Swedish classic, a miniature boy getting off a goose on a lake side landscape, with other geese coming in for the landing.
nils-holgersson.jpg.title: Nils Holgersson

faery-thinker.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
faery-thinker.jpg.description: A young faery stands on a tree mushroom, looking into the distance. What could trouble her so?
faery-thinker.jpg.title: The Faery Thinker

ocean-on-my-mind.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
ocean-on-my-mind.jpg.description: A brick wall in pinks and purples, with the silhouette of a woman's head showing the ocean.
ocean-on-my-mind.jpg.title: Ocean on my mind

ocean.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
ocean.jpg.description: A red and blue ocean with a ship sailing on it. The colours are quite saturated.
ocean.jpg.title: Mythical Ocean

omen.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
omen.jpg.description: A person with a third eye and braided hair pulled into a bun, wearing a linen shirt, against a blue background.
omen.jpg.title: Omen, No Moon Lunar

orange-girl.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
orange-girl.jpg.description: Pop-art experiment based on an image with a girl holding halved oranges in front of her eyes, except the colours are mainly purple.
orange-girl.jpg.title: Pop-art in Purple

queen-of-fairies.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
queen-of-fairies.jpg.description: Larger than many of my other fairies, this winged and crowned woman is sitting on a tree branch and enjoying life.
queen-of-fairies.jpg.title: Titania, Queen of Fairy

ran-ship.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
ran-ship.jpg.description: A strange ocean with dark clouds and bright reds and oranges. An old ship is being pulled out of the ocean on a wave.
ran-ship.jpg.title: Rising ship of Ran

shaman.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
shaman.jpg.description: Based on a photo from Greby burial field, this shows an eerie night and a woman standing between worlds.
shaman.jpg.title: Völva on Greby burial field

sirius.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
sirius.jpg.description: A masssive golden brown dog with an inner light is laying in a teal, high-tech tunnel. There's static in the image.
sirius.jpg.title: Sirius, the Star Dog

sol-beata.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
sol-beata.jpg.description: Sol is standing on the same set of stairs as Daniel, but the scene shows more, including mist gathering at the bottom of the stairs and rolling from the top. The doll Beata is half-hidden behind the stairs. St Dymphna.
sol-beata.jpg.title: Sol, Haunted enby

song-weaver.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
song-weaver.jpg.description: A woman in red with red hair and marble skin is standing in a hallway with arched windows letting in light.
song-weaver.jpg.title: Song Weaver, Jadeborn Zenith

stepping-out.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
stepping-out.jpg.description: A wooden table with some ivy has a vintage book cover laying on it. The woman on the cover image looks ready to step away from it.
stepping-out.jpg.title: Stepping Out

tess.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
tess.jpg.description: In front of the same room as the ghost Erik, stands a woman looking more than a little nervous. She's pretty, in jean shorts and a t-shirt, with her dark hair loose. St Dymphna.
tess.jpg.title: Tess Lindblom, Blogger

valkyrie.jpg.creator: AM Hogebrandt
valkyrie.jpg.description: A vintage scene of some kind of stone formation, with a black woman (the valkyrie) and her ulv (giant wolf) at the right front.
valkyrie.jpg.title: Modern Valkyria
